Blizzard was the Software Team Lead for the "One Laptop Per Child" program through [[Red Hat]]. He helped to develop the modified version of [[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora Core]] Linux that ran on the new laptops. He handled all integration and community work with the [[OLPC]] project and unveiled the laptop in a video <ref>{{cite web | url=http://www.siliconvalleysleuth.com/2006/06/first_video_of_.html | title=First video of a working "One Laptop Per Child" laptop | accessdate=2007-09-06}}</ref> on Friday, [[June 2]], [[2006]]. Chris was also involved with the development of the OLPC's [[Sugar (GUI)|Sugar]] interface.
